website_summaries.verdict: This inflatable stability cushion can be used at your desk or during your workout for better balance, strength, and posture.
pros: Use seated or standing to improve muscle tone, posture, and balance
Non-slip, textured surface on both sides
cons: There have been a few complaints of air leaking out of the cushion when weight is applied to it

customer_reviews.title: but like a few others
customer_reviews.text: I just received the balance disc, but like a few others, it did not come with the pump, as advertised. Package was sealed, even the box the disc came in looked fine - just no pump. Do I need to exchange the whole thing to hopefully get a pump in the next one, or will the manufacturer send out the missing pump? Update: I ended up returning it - since Vive told me to call Amazon, and Amazon said to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Rox - Shopper

customer_reviews.title: 100% worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I’m OBSESSED with this thing. I got it bc my posture is awful, in large part bc my abs/core is so weak, so I thought it would help with that, but it is SO MUCH more than that!! I do love to sit on it, which activates my core muscles, but I also stand on it when I do the dishes. And I’ve done squats on it, which FIRES up my glutes. And I love standing on the more spikey side bc it’s kind of like acupressure on the soles of my feet
customer_reviews.author: Hiwa A.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I purchased it because I have a back pain issue and I thought that I could use it for this reason. It works really well for me. It is sturdy and it does not have any chemical smell. It has two different textures. I use both sides depending on how I feel. The customer service is superb! My order came without the attachment to inflate the cushion. I contacted the company and they immediately sent me a replacement. Very nice work! I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: angela

customer_reviews.title: Great for use at home for balance and core!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Prompt delivery. Clear instructions. Is really helping me work on balance, core and rehab for a knee injury. The only annoying thing has been how quickly and frequently the company have pestered me to leave feedback!! I wanted to use it for a while before I posted anything. That aside, it's a really good addition to my home gym and I'm very happy I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Wright

customer_reviews.title: BUY THE Balance Disc by Viv. Don't think twice...Get one today, you will not regret it!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome.I use it for balance & core building.I also use it for spinal positioning which is also imperative for core strengthing.I also use the 2 different sides of the disc for various levels of massage for back & sitting.The Balance Disc by Vine is an all in one wonderful gift that keeps giving back.I recommend it to others.I give it as a gift & I would buy another one for myself too.Tx.M
customer_reviews.author: M.WOOLARD

customer_reviews.title: Won’t hold air. Returned immediately!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these. I am 6’3 210lb so not the lightest guy but certainly within normal ranges. After blowing up soon as I stood on it I could hear the air escaping and the wobble was deflated in just a few minutes. This happened for both wobbles so it is not just one defective unit. I returned immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Hawaiian Brian

customer_reviews.title: Helps with posture at work
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying my wobble cushion! I sit at a desk all day for work and have been using the cushion to “force” me to have correct posture. I expect it to save me a bunch of money that would otherwise be spent on massages and the chiropractor.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Bateman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for dachshund PT rehab
customer_reviews.text: Not its intended purpose, but this is ideal for helping rehab our 18lb dachshund's strength and mobility. He has degenerative disc disease and after spending weeks on crate rest recovery, he needs to rebuild leg muscle. We put his back legs on it while he's distracted by eating dinner and gently "wobble". It's very easy to see his muscles at work when he engages them for balance. Husband and I (220 + 120lbs respectively) have both tested it out too and we're surprised how effective such a small device can be. Love its affordability, compact size and that it easily tucks away beside the couch. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: miriam r

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't inflate
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I got a defective unit or if this is just a POS. I've tried to inflate the cushion several times, for several minutes, and it will not fill up passed a certain point. Well, when I try to use it at this point, the cushion deflates so much when I stand on it that I can feel the ground, completely defeating the purpose of this cushion. They also shipped this product direct in its product box, not double boxed, and the boxed was damaged (duh) upon arrival. Not sure if this played a part in the unit I received not working.
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Love the multi-use options
customer_reviews.text: This is my second wobble cushion. I have one at home for my exercise routine, balancing on the disk while using hand weights. I also used it as a chair cushion while working on my computer to strengthen my core and keep good posture. I decided to purchase another one to show my massage clients the possibilities for home exercises. You should be getting some new customers soon :-)
customer_reviews.author: Dharma

customer_reviews.title: Item is as described
customer_reviews.text: The instructions don't provide detail information about inflating the disc, the disc does arrive completely flat. That being said, I was very cautious not to puncture the disc with the needle to inflate. It took a while to inflate the disc because the needle was bent. The item is working as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Indentations and shipped in more narrow box than pictured.
customer_reviews.text: I am writing this review because my products did come in company box, but a much smaller one. My cushions were all folded in half. When filling them up I still have those indentations pretty prominent even when completely aired up. I have them all aired up (which took a long time with four) to check for leaks etc. Indentations is why I lowered this review.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Wordinger

customer_reviews.title: Need strong pin to inflate this, the one they sent is very fragile and breaks immediately.
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't inflate the rubber seems to be very good quality but the tools (valve/pin) Is very fragile and thin, it breaks and not convenient. They should provide additional valves to fill the air, it not expensive. I will appreciate if they send me strong pin for future use. Right now, I managed it. Note: The pin comes with basket balls are worth, trust me the Cushion is very good quality. I can feel it.
customer_reviews.author: Deepam Patel

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a product to reduce extreme back pain!
customer_reviews.text: The VIVE Wobble Cushion is just what I needed to help alleviate back and neck pain from sitting at my computer for extended periods of time. I have had several neck and upper back spinal surgeries and I have been searching for a product to use that helps with the pain of sitting for long periods at a time. I've only had the Wobble Cushion a week and already experiencing significantly less pain. I also love the feature of helping to build core strength and balance.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Budden

customer_reviews.title: Great for strengthening balance
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item to assist me with vestibular therapy - exercises that strengthen the vestibular system, which controls balance. This balance disc is one of many tools I now use that has helped me tremendously. As a result I've gained better balance and stability. It's made well and is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: MJackowski

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: So...it’s shipped in the box that it comes it. When I opened it it was scratched up. I was able to inflate it but after 2 days it started deflating. My guess is due to the scratches that it came with there is probably a small leak somewhere. I’m not sitting on it or putting my full body weight on it. I’m using it as a back pillow rest to support my back on my office chair.
customer_reviews.author: Patutii

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I use these in my classroom. I have 8 of them. The students use them to sit on or stand on. They really enjoy them. However, I could not inflate them with the tool that came with it. I had to get my husband to use his air compressor.
customer_reviews.author: Shasta Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Will not inflate
customer_reviews.text: Well, this is my fault for not returning it wirhin the proper time frame. Anyways this will not inflate and I will not waste more money buying another one. Good luck if anyone buys one of these
customer_reviews.author: T. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Didn't inflate
customer_reviews.text: The product will not inflate no matter what we do. At first I contacted the company because I thought the pump was a problem. They kindly replaced the pump for me (the reason this review is 2 stars instead of 1) but I tried again and still no luck. I've basically given up.
customer_reviews.author: User737

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality at a great price. Easy to inflate. I'm making good use of my VIVE Wobble Cushion! It's good for working on balance and kicking your lunges up a notch. I also use it under one hand to do push-ups and between my knees for inner thigh squeezes. It's a great workout tool!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Make a big difference
customer_reviews.text: As a preventative measure, these are fantastic. My volleyball playing daughter reduced her ankle and back issues dramatically after we got these and had her use them before every practice or game.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! I work in a pediatric clinic at the front desk, I got this to sit on at work to keep my back straight by balancing on the ball while we work. It's Great! Not only is my posture improving, but it helps your abs by tightening and having to force yourself to balance. All the girls are buying them too!
customer_reviews.author: Kyla rockholt

customer_reviews.title: No bueno
customer_reviews.text: This took me forever to inflate. The pump kept disassembling and it was so hard to inflate. After I inflated it, the thing deflated with my 1st use. Clearly I got a defective one so I returned it
customer_reviews.author: GISELLE JACKMAN

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I used one during physical therapy. It is very useful to me to regain, and keep, my balance. I tried it barefoot for the massaging effect, and found it uncomfortable. But, with shoes on, I love the workout it gives me.
customer_reviews.author: Ardell

customer_reviews.title: I am pleased with this item
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with this item. I have been using this for awhile now and haven't had any issues with air leaking out. I like the idea I can add as much air as needed according to my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have only used the product for sitting, since I received not to long, to experiment and use in other ways. It's comfortable and seems to help with posture and back. Because it is a plastic material I use with a thin cushion on top. Would be nice to have some sort of cover on it. ( my opinion and preference ) I use all the time now. I'm sure I'm gonna love it. At this time I'm very pleased. I recommend the Balance Disc by Vive!
customer_reviews.author: Gloria L.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and highly adaptable device
customer_reviews.text: I use it as a balance pad while standing at my desk. I use it as a back support while sitting in my chair. I use it for exercises. I had no idea this little donut would be so versatile, but the quality and durability of this particular brand is stellar.
customer_reviews.author: KO

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: It does what it's suppose to do but it's a little small and I have small feet. The pump that came with it was broken...needle wa bend and it does not stay in the fill area.
customer_reviews.author: Ishop

customer_reviews.title: Great Therapy Aid for Back Surgery Recovery!
customer_reviews.text: Great therapy for recovery from back surgery. This aids in strengthening the core and restoring balance. Excellent exercise book included, which I love. I sit on it too— the cushion, not the book.
customer_reviews.author: Charmaine Beleele

customer_reviews.title: OK, but too small for me
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this, I knew this was a very basic cushion, and that it was small. Its accompanying picture does show 2 feet on the cushion and it looks like it might be adequate. But my large feet really cover the cushion, so it hasn't been as useful to me as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy.  Air leak is too much.  You must do pumping every minutes!
customer_reviews.text: The cushion requires air pumping every time. During usage, I can hear continuous air leakage, and after 10 min, it becomes flat. Terrible! I don't buy from this company anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Takayuki

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Arrrived as promised, and I couldn’t be happier. Easy to inflate! I bought 2...one for my wife, and the other for my daughter...they both love it! Thanks for a great product and price! I highly recommend this seller!
customer_reviews.author: Fernando F

customer_reviews.title: Great for working on balance and strengthening
customer_reviews.text: Began using one of these while in physical therapy. Got one so I could use it at home. Great for working on balance and strengthening.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well for a trail runner!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly this product works a lot better than I expected. Went for the cheaper option verses the balance boards to work on ankle stability and am thinking about ordering another one. Wish it had a little wider radius, but still great for those looking to add another aspect to their strength training.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am using for Balance which I lost after an ...
customer_reviews.text: I am using for Balance which I lost after an Open Heart Surgery. I noticed this kind of product is used in Physical Exercise Equipment at PIVOT. No doubt it will take time and will be worth a try. If I am successful I will contact you, otherwise it will be worth the exercise regardless. Gene Feb 23; I continue to use at least twice a day while watching TV. Walking is getting better, am very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: eugene sohl

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Sucks. Didn’t come with the air pump. I had to buy my own and couldn’t get it to work. I’d already thrown the box out so I couldn’t return it. Emailed company and never heard back. I eventually threw the item away. No use without the air pump.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Curley

customer_reviews.title: Love this cushion!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this wobble cushion for my son who was diagnosed with ADHD. He loves sitting on it getting his movements out while still working on seatwork at school. He also loves standing on it and balancing. He likes the texture of the cushion. I also use this for students in my classroom who need to move around. I would continue to purchase from this company for the quality and price a wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Stanford

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing! Takes a lot of energy to stand on it on one leg. I am recovering from an ACL/Meniscus reconstruction and this thing should get my legs in shape in no time! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jay L

customer_reviews.title: VIVE has great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: VIVE has been extremely helpful! The first order we placed came without a pump so I contacted VIVE customer service and they shipped a brand new one with a pump! It has been very good in helping my husband with his knee rehab after having surgery.
customer_reviews.author: Alber Martinez

customer_reviews.title: For my purpose of ankle rehab, the cushion was ...
customer_reviews.text: For my purpose of ankle rehab, the cushion was too soft even with adjustments to inflation. Cushion sides need to be more ridged for greater lateral stability. The inflation level will then adjust plantar and dorsi flexion as well as pro and supination
customer_reviews.author: Kens

customer_reviews.title: Great for the knees
customer_reviews.text: Got this for knee rehab after a patellar subluxation. I didn't want to spring for a bosu ball and this has really done the trick for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: RxTrahan

customer_reviews.title: Great cushion
customer_reviews.text: great cushion for balance and physical therapy. even my toddler gets on it and tries to balance
customer_reviews.author: Lana G.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great value!
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome! It arrived promptly and in great condition. The cushion comes with a pump so that you can inflate it to your desired firmness. It also comes with a booklet of some suggested exercises. I am using it primarily as a seat cushion to engage my core and improve my posture when I am sitting for long hours at work. So far, it has helped immensely!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not come with the pump !
customer_reviews.text: This cushion is just as promised and I use it. It even shows a pump on the box and says in the title that a pump is included. I would return it but since I do have a pump at home I decided not to bother. If the pump had been included I would have ranked it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: franniep51

customer_reviews.title: Product works as intended. Why spend money to go ...
customer_reviews.text: Product works as intended. Why spend money to go to PT 2x/week when they just have me sit and do exercises on this thing? Buy it and do it at home for a fraction of the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Coy

customer_reviews.title: Achilles rehab.
customer_reviews.text: I had Achilles surgery and as part of my rehabilitation I used a disc similar to this. I decided to buy one for myself to continue my strengthening exercises at home. I'm impressed at the durability of this product. It's not a cheap item. I use it every day and and thoroughly pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Chick w dogs

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought it would be!
customer_reviews.text: I use this wobble cushion with my stand up desk at work, and it's a good work out for the legs just trying to stay steady, and keeps my posture upright at well. It's good to use for narrow squats too. I recommend it to my coworkers who are curious when they see me on it and want to try it out.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Not great to sit on.
customer_reviews.text: A friend of mine recommended this to me. I got it to sit on at work. I'm giving this four starts b/c after just a little bit of time the cushion makes my bottom feel numb. I don't know why that is. If others have found a way to avoid this problem. Please let me know.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly Cushion is useful to sit on in addition to being an exercise tool
customer_reviews.text: I bought this device to place it on my desk chair and sit on it so that its wobbly nature would make it easier for me to move about and not get stuck in one position for a long time which is bad for my sciatica. I found this helpful, although it did require me to reposition my chair and keyboard because of the changed height.
customer_reviews.author: sfjon4

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: If you’re doing your own pt at home, this is just as good as the devices used at top of line clinics.
customer_reviews.author: Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying.  Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for about a week. Used it 5 or 6 times now. Some instructions on how to inflate would've been nice. Figured it out by wetting the needle from Youtube. The product seems of good quality. Has worked as I expected thus far. Would recommend or buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Fine Useful Product! So many uses! Very durable and well made!
customer_reviews.text: I sit on it more than stand, but in any capacity, this pad works really well, very useful, planning to buy a second one home and work!!!
customer_reviews.author: BPS&L AUDIO

customer_reviews.title: Goid price and does the job
customer_reviews.text: I am using the disc for balance and stability training so I cannot speak to the pain relief qualities. However, the disc is working as described and was priced great!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Won’t inflate
customer_reviews.text: Won’t inflate or deflate. To soft for me to use it needs more air, but the pump does not appear to be able to enter the chamber.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Arnott

customer_reviews.title: Great for Physical Therapy
customer_reviews.text: I use this for PT exercises, namely balance lunges and one leg balances. It's a great challenge and I feel like I'm really improving!
customer_reviews.author: Syd Jen

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Nice little pillow for my desk chair. I sit on it in hopes to help with my posture and stomache muscles. I also place it behind my back as support for my lower back when I am not sitting on it. I switch back and forth throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Nova Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Great for my calves
customer_reviews.text: It works as expected. It is larger than the one used in the gym but the reviews were better. My trainer, Kenji, makes me use it for my calves and it works beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Mauro Chiappe

customer_reviews.title: Pump is cheap
customer_reviews.text: The pad seems fine the included pump completely fell apart. Used a bike pump.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item horrible packageing
customer_reviews.text: Horrible to pump up. The air valve was angled through packageing. Bought two disc broke both air pumps due to the angle of the valve in packageing. After it was aired up it’s a great product....if you can air it up.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Moralez

customer_reviews.title: Our PT uses this to increase core balance. I ...
customer_reviews.text: Our PT uses this to increase core balance. I bought this to exercise between the pt sessions. So far no problems, works flawlessly. It comes with a small booklet with exercises as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dave & Julia

customer_reviews.title: ... with my Driftsun balance board and it is working fine. The supplied hand pump is a little cheasy ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use with my Driftsun balance board and it is working fine. The supplied hand pump is a little cheasy and I used my air compressor instead . The "needle" supplied with the pump is very fragile and easy to bend.
customer_reviews.author: Steve L.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Really helps prevent lower back pain from keeping your core activated while sitting at work. Simple but effective.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Chen

customer_reviews.title: needle broke at first attempt to inflate.
customer_reviews.text: We have no way to tell how whether it works or it due to the needle broke on fist attempt to inflate, is there anyway to get a replacement needle for the pump?
customer_reviews.author: Tina L.

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Relieves my butt and back pain on days I have to sit for long periods of time! Enjoy a little workout out while at work as well. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Robinm912

customer_reviews.title: Takes a little practice for a beginner...
customer_reviews.text: Takes a little practice for a beginner, but I have found this to be a fun new way to work on my posture and core. Comes with a guide book with recommended exercises. It had a bit of a smell when first opened, but aired out quickly. Easily inflated with the pump included. Overall, a great purchase at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, I don't have much experience in exercise equipment
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, I don't have much experience in exercise equipment.. My trainer on the other had said it's a very nice product for the price. My 4 years old son love to balance himself on it as well. It's a safe and great piece of equipment to share with my son while I exercise at home.
customer_reviews.author: Faten

customer_reviews.title: Don't leave in the sun
customer_reviews.text: As advertised and a good workout tool but DO NOT leave in a sunny room. The sun shone through my door onto it and warped the plastic. It's still holding up, even under pressure, but it has a real dent in one side.
customer_reviews.author: Jpaw1992

customer_reviews.title: Amazing  workout item for keeping your core in top condition!
customer_reviews.text: This little disc reaps big benefits- it is very difficult to center yourself on it and build up your core, and that's exactly what you need to perfect this device. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: SDeFranco1

customer_reviews.title: No more back pain...
customer_reviews.text: I use the cushion on my chair at work. After 1 day, I noticed less lower back, periformis and IT Band pain.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy C.

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive way to work the legs and core.
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy using this to improve my core muscle strength, as well as my balance.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Preston

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: “Excellent product. Had no problem inflating the cushion to the desired pressure. Cushion has held pressure for over a month.”
customer_reviews.author: Richard Cooke

customer_reviews.title: I have just received my wobble cushion and have started ...
customer_reviews.text: I have just received my wobble cushion and have started using it at my desk. I am hoping that it will help me strengthen my core which had gotten weak after surgery. Will have to see how effective this is along with exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Great for improving balance and strengthening my ankles
customer_reviews.text: I'm still experimenting with how much air it should have( the more air the easier it works) but so far it's great for improved balance and strengthening my ankles.
customer_reviews.author: Jim I

customer_reviews.title: Great for working on your balance.
customer_reviews.text: The cushion really helps me work on my balance. It is sturdy and does not slide.
customer_reviews.author: Donna L

customer_reviews.title: I like that it is compact
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is compact, but mostly that it does what it is supposed to do. I purchased for working out my core. I started out slow, as it definitely worked the core.
customer_reviews.author: Elida Barnes

customer_reviews.title: This came quickly and was easy to inflate with the supplied pump
customer_reviews.text: This came quickly and was easy to inflate with the supplied pump. I had ordered another device which not even my physical therapist could inflate to proper amount even with the needle they supplied. So I am happy that this worked. Seems to be heavy-duty tough plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Martin

customer_reviews.title: The cushion did not come with an air pump or ...
customer_reviews.text: The cushion did not come with an air pump or with a needle to fill it with air. This made it really hard to know how it does or does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica D.

customer_reviews.title: It is great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for ankle injury work and it is great for that, like it to sit on and balance too!
customer_reviews.author: j Michael Lawler

customer_reviews.title: This balance disc helps my husband strengthen his back to ...
customer_reviews.text: This balance disc helps my husband strengthen his back to improve his level of overall back pain. He puts it on a dining room chair and sits on it several times a day.
customer_reviews.author: Wildcat Gardener

customer_reviews.title: Similar to the one I use for PT at hospital ...
customer_reviews.text: Similar to the one I use for PT at hospital. I can now continue to do the exercises at home.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia K Dowell

customer_reviews.title: Great for balance!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this cushion to use at home as part of my physical therapy rehabilitation. I was using at the PT sessions. I joke that now I have my own gym at home. Well this cushion helps me with the balance and resistance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent balance tool
customer_reviews.text: Great tool too increase balance and build muscle strength. A lot more sturdy than I had imagined! I use it at my standup desk to increase balance and burn extra calories throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Get another pump
customer_reviews.text: Unable to inflate. Needle on pump broke off immediately while trying to inflate. I will revise review once i am able to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy McMackin

customer_reviews.title: valid and cheap rocker board option
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these, stacked them on top of each other and placed a board over them. Now I have my own standing desk balance board. I prefer the 2 of them but this can easily be done with one. The dimensions of the board are 37 x 11 x .75. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great for ankle strengthening exercises and the booklet with other balance oriented workouts is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Duke

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well
customer_reviews.text: Improves my balance and posture while sitting, but needed to cover with a blanket to cushion the bumps and bristles on the surface
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Good, but small.
customer_reviews.text: Seems well made, a bit small, the inflate/deflate port was hard to find at first. Got this to continue rehab at home but i think I'll need something larger.
customer_reviews.author: Rafe J.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed! I have arthritis in my ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed! I have arthritis in my lower back. Been issuing this to strengthen core muscles while sitting at my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Helps posture
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I sit on it to help me be more mindful of my posture and use it for balancing posture and PT.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie birse

customer_reviews.title: Exercise Disk
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Described as indicated in the article. Very high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Sr..

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Overall the product is great however my only complaints it was really hard to pump air in the disc because 3 out 4 items came in a small box and folded so so difficult to pump air
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer N.

customer_reviews.title: valve not sealed
customer_reviews.text: the valve was not sealed in place and when I received the cushion, it was loose inside. rendering the item impossible to inflate and therefor useless
customer_reviews.author: Shannon A.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great product with multiple options for exercises and easy to have in the home
customer_reviews.author: diane pepple

customer_reviews.title: Its a good idea
customer_reviews.text: Not used to it yet, but it seems sturdy - seems to hold air well. Was disappointed that there were no specific instructions for this, as the box and enclosed workout ideas all say to "inflate to specific standards" I was expecting to have to inflate per weight or height...I guess not. I hope it can hold me.
customer_reviews.author: kris evans

customer_reviews.title: Helping with my balance, core and posture
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to help with my core which effects my balance and my posture. I'm still learning how to use this disc, it is definitely helping with balance.
customer_reviews.author: Journal4Him

customer_reviews.title: Awesome balance trainer and really good quality
customer_reviews.text: Awesome balance trainer and really good quality. I leave it in my living room and hop on while I'm watching tv.
customer_reviews.author: J. Will

customer_reviews.title: Great For Circulation and Strengthening
customer_reviews.text: I bought it primarily to strengthen my knees but I use it at work and sit on it to get circulation in my buttocks and legs. Feels good on my core muscles as well.
customer_reviews.author: Krugie

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase; good sellers
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for, as an exercise aid to improve balance and strengthen muscles needed for balance, and as a seat cushion.
customer_reviews.author: A. E. Hege

customer_reviews.title: I bought another one!
customer_reviews.text: I liked it so much! This is just what I need to stabilize my core.
customer_reviews.author: lionesspride

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. I actually already had one but went to a training school for military and doing 3 weeks of a lot of sitting. This is perfect to keep my back from getting stiff. Especially after a back injury. Plus all the other great things you can do with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Vive Wobble Cushion - Inflatable Balance Disc Seat - Fitness Core Stability Trainer Wiggle Pad for Office Chair, Rehab, Isokinetics, PT - Kids Adult Workout Sensory Seat Equipment with Exercise Book
feature_bullets: IMPROVE BALANCE AND POSTURE: Increasing core strength, the balance disc improves posture and balance when used on a seat or on the floor while standing. Providing effective tension release, the balance disc relieves back pain and reduces fatigue, elevating energy levels for those who remain seated throughout the day. Used on a chair, the balance cushion creates an active experience, promoting greater focus and concentration while improving posture and overall stability.

STABILIZE, STRENGTHEN AND TONE MUSCLES: Use in conjunction with any workout routine for increased effectiveness. The unstable disc requires more muscle activation to maintain your balance, increasing stability and strengthening and toning core, leg and back muscles.
NONSLIP, TEXTURED SURFACE: Dual textured surface includes both a studded massage side and a slightly raised dimpled side to provide greater traction and a secure, nonslip grip when exercising.

TEAR-RESISTANT INFLATABLE DISC WITH AIR PUMP: Easily inflate to your desired level of firmness with the included air pump. The balance disc measures 12.5” when inflated and is constructed with a durable latex-free material that is tear and split-resistant and supports up to 440 pounds. Conveniently portable, the disc can be deflated for compact storage or travel.
VIVE GUARANTEE: 60 day unconditional guarantee so you can purchase now with confidence
